TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LambdaValue`1<TResult> extends System.Activities.CodeActivity`1<!TResult> implements class System.Activities.XamlIntegration.IValueSerializableExpression
Public NotInheritable Class LambdaValue(Of TResult) Inherits CodeActivity(Of TResult) Implements IValueSerializableExpression
generic <typename TResult> public ref class LambdaValue sealed : System::Activities::CodeActivity<TResult>, System::Activities::XamlIntegration::IValueSerializableExpression

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 表达式返回的值的类型。

span.span: The type of value returned by the expression.

summary.span: 表示一个用作右值的 lambda 表达式，它支持绑定 参数。

span.span: Represents a lambda expression used as an r-value, which supports binding of arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于代码中指定的 lambda 表达式，并且不能序列化为 XAML。 is used for lambda expressions specified in code and cannot be serialized to XAML. 如果尝试序列化包含 的工作流，则会引发 。If an attempt to serialize a workflow that contains a is made, a is thrown. 如果包含工作流需要 XAML 序列化，请使用 或使用 将 转换为可序列化的格式。If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use or use to convert the to a format that can be serialized. 此活动使用 LINQ to 实体提供程序来评估 LINQ 表达式。This activity uses the LINQ to Entity provider to evaluate LINQ expressions. 与此活动一起使用任何 LINQ 表达式必须是可由 ADO.Net 实体数据模型计算。Any LINQ expressions used with this activity must be evaluatable by the ADO.Net Entity Data Model. 例如，LINQ 表达式无法用于引用活动、 变量或自变量的工作流本身。For example, LINQ expressions cannot be used to reference activities, variables, or arguments of the workflow itself.
